msbt.message: I had the strangest dream! In it, I was writing an important letter to you. Alas, when I awoke, I couldn't remember what the letter was about! I guess we'll never know. Anyhoo, hope this finds you well.

I was out for a stroll when, quite suddenly, you sprang to my mind. I had this powerful feeling I should write you. And so I have! I don't have much to say, but I do hope my letter has brightened your day!
I started writing this message because I had something to tell you. But now, all of a sudden, I'm drawing a complete blank! It's quite embarrassing, but I shall send this letter to you anyway!

I want you to know that you are a fabulous friend, and I appreciate you for being you. Sometimes I forget to say it, darling, but I want you to know that I think it often. I am lucky to have you as a friend!

I just have to tell you about this FAB dream I had! In it, I became a world-famous fashion designer. I was SO popular that celebrities fought over me! Do you think this dream foretold my future? Say yes!

I do enjoy craft projects, don't you? Focusing oneself on making something beautiful is a wonderful stress reliever. And finishing it is so very fulfilling. The hard part is deciding which project to start!

I was about to catch the most exquisite bug, but it eluded me at the very last second! I know I shouldn't give up, but I'm terribly frustrated! Thank you for letting me vent, darling. You're the best!

I'm writing to you because we get along so well. Also, I wanted to tell you that I value open and honest communication. So please, if anything ever comes to mind, feel free to talk to me. I'm here for you!
Do you ever feel down in the dumps? I certainly do! When that happens, I like to rearrange my room. It's refreshing—and empowering—to reshape the world around you. Go on! Give it a try!
Is there anything better than receiving a letter from someone out of the blue? I think not! It makes my heart pitter-patter with excitement. I hope this letter has done the same for you!
